jhelp.util.post

Class PostOffice

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.post.PostOffice

  • public class PostOffice
extends java.lang.Object
    Post office for deliver Message between users.
    Each User have to register for be able receive Message.
    2 different users can't have the same name
    Author:
    JHelp

      • addToGroup

        public void addToGroup(User user,
              java.lang.String group)
        Add a user to a group.
        If the user is not already registered, it is automatically register.
        If the group not already exits, it is created
        Parameters:
        user - User to add
        group - Group where add.

        sender - Message sender

        message - Message to send
